definition: category/genus (taxonomy)/family members/dependents/to belong to/subordinate to/affiliated with/be born in the year of (one of the 12 animals)/to be/to prove to be/to constitute
to join together/to fix one's attention on/to concentrate on

sentences.english: It would be a pity for Japan if the Liberal Democrats gave up without a fight, however.
sentences.chinese: 倘若自民党不战而败，对日本而言，实属憾事。

sentences.english: Although the understanding and forgiveness of surau committee chairman Mohd Hasbi Ismail is rare, it is very much appreciated.
sentences.chinese: 芙蓉祈祷室理事会主席的谅解和宽恕，实属难得。

sentences.english: A key to the species of Caesalpinia based on leaf venation characters is presented.
sentences.chinese: 编写了中国云实属植物叶片脉序特征分种检索表。

sentences.english: It's not easy to construct such a place in the remote mountain forest to live.
sentences.chinese: 在这偏僻的山林能有一个栖止之所实属不易。

sentences.english: Therefore, it is really necessary and essential to improve the mortgage system of maximum amount of China.
sentences.chinese: 因此，进一步完善我国最高额抵押制度就实属必要。

sentences.english: A crime such as matricide is inconceivable.
sentences.chinese: 象杀母这样的罪行实属不可思议。

sentences.english: It's not easy talking to a relative or friend who is dying.
sentences.chinese: 与垂死的亲人或朋友谈话实属不易。

sentences.english: D. Because he hadn't eaten her fried fish at all.
sentences.chinese: 旅行人根本没吃炸鱼，实属妇女强词夺理。

sentences.english: Paper-cut can picture the presentation of the content lifelike delicated ghost axe god knife.
sentences.chinese: 剪纸能将画面的内容表现的活灵活现实属鬼斧神刀。

sentences.english: There are many reasons why Internet addiction exists. But to deny its existence is to see no evil and hear no evil.
sentences.chinese: 在我看来，否认网瘾的存在，实属见了棺材也不掉泪。

sentences.english: It is very important and necessary to study the circumstance of the subjective crime of excessive defense.
sentences.chinese: 研究防卫过当的主观罪过形式实属重要。

sentences.english: So, mid-stream clean catch urinary culture are necessary in antepartum examination.
sentences.chinese: 因此，中段尿培养在产前检查中实属必要。
现在两位数的增长实属正常。

sentences.english: In the busy work, Zhu Dong E Lianbi still stopped working, it is not easy.
sentences.chinese: 在繁忙的工作之余，朱东锷仍不辍练笔，实属不易。

sentences.english: IT IS rare to come upon a child prodigy in art collecting.
sentences.chinese: 艺术收藏界的神童实属罕见。
